pageContext.html:
{% highlight swift %}

Observable<[Notice]>.of(self.notifications) .replaceNilWith([]) .bind(to: tableView.rx.items(cellIdentifier: "NotificationTableViewCell", cellType: NotificationTableViewCell.self)) { indexPath, notice, cell in cell.notice = notice }.disposed(by: disposeBag)

subject = BehaviorSubject(value: self.notifications) subject?.bind(to: tableView.rx.items(cellIdentifier: "NotificationTableViewCell", cellType: NotificationTableViewCell.self)) { indexPath, notice, cell in cell.notice = notice }.disposed(by: disposeBag)

self.subject?.onNext(self.notifications)

{% endhighlight %}
